title: Continuous Diagnostic and Mitigation Tools, Services Available to Federal Civilian Government
text:
23 Continuous Diagnostic and Mitigation Tools, Services Available to Federal Civilian Government 
Homeland Security Today: The Department of Homeland Security (DHS), through the General Services Administration (GSA), has awarded three orders under the departmentâ€™s Continuous Diagnostics and Mitigation Program (CDM), making CDM tools and services available to 17 additional federal agencies.DHS has now made CDM available to 97 percent of the federal civilian government, DHS Secretary Jeh Johnson said in announcing the award.
